    • Constructor Detail

      • MavenVerticleFactory

        public MavenVerticleFactory()
        Creates an instance of MavenVerticleFactory using the system properties to initialize the ResolverOptions.

        It uses the default resolver implementation.

      • MavenVerticleFactory

        public MavenVerticleFactory(ResolverOptions options)
        Creates an instance of MavenVerticleFactory with the given resolution options.

        It uses the default resolver implementation.

        Parameters:
        options - the options.

      • MavenVerticleFactory

        public MavenVerticleFactory(Resolver resolver)
        Creates an instance of MavenVerticleFactory with a custom Resolver. The resolver must already be configured.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to use
